title: $:/plugins/skeeve/documentation
description: An collection of filters and widgets to pick out text by using rgular expressions
author: Skeeve
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/skeeve/documentation/documentation": { "title": "$:/plugins/skeeve/documentation/documentation", "created": "20180225140135000", "modified": "20180225141741000", "text": "\define documentation(text tiddler) $text$ <$list filter="[all[current]regexp[#]]"> <$splitgroups $separator="#" text="$1" link="$2"> <$macrocall $name="documentation" text=<> tiddler=<>/> <$list filter="[all[current]!regexp[#]]"> <$macrocall $name="documentation" text=<> tiddler=<>/> " }, "$:/plugins/skeeve/documentation/example": { "title": "$:/plugins/skeeve/documentation/example", "created": "20180225125733000", "modified": "20180225141741000", "tags": "", "text": "\define example(title src) !Example for $title$ ``` $src$ ``` \end <$macrocall $name="example" title={{!!title}} src={{!!text}}/> !! Output of example <<< {{!!text}} <<< " }, "$:/plugins/skeeve/action-increment/icon": { "title": "$:/plugins/skeeve/action-increment/icon", "created": "20180222184551000", "modified": "20180225140135000", "text": " " }, "$:/plugins/skeeve/documentation/license": { "title": "$:/plugins/skeeve/documentation/license", "created": "20180225140135000", "modified": "20180225140135000", "text": "The documentation plugin is published under the same [[permissive BSD 3-Clause License|https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause]] as [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com]] stored in the shadow tiddler [[$:/core/copyright.txt]]:
{{$:/core/copyright.txt}}
" }, "$:/plugins/skeeve/documentation/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/skeeve/documentation/readme", "created": "20180225140135000", "modified": "20180225140135000", "text": "The ''documentation'' plugin contains tiddlers used by my other plugins. Do not use the documentation tiddlers in production code as I might change them without notice. " } } }
